title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 4053/89 of 19 December 1989 allocating for 1990 certain catch quotas between the Member States for vessels fishing in Faroese waters
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) N° 4053/89 of 19 December 1988 allocating for 1990 certain catch quotas between  the Member States for vessels fishing in Faroese waters
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: 1.  From 1 January to 31 December 1990 catches taken by vessels flying the flag of a  Member State in the waters falling within the fisheries jurisdiction of the Faroe Islands, under  the arrangement on reciprocal fishing rights for 1990 between the Community and the Faroe Islands,  shall not exceed the quotas set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1989.
For the CouncilThe PresidentJ. MELLICK
(1)OJ N° L 24, 27. 1. 1983, p. 1.
(2)OJ N° L 302, 15. 11. 1985, p. 1.
(3)OJ N° L 207, 29. 7. 1987, p. 1.
(4)OJ N° L 306, 11. 11. 1988, p. 2.
